sub_title: Entrepreneur in Education & Real Estate | Co-founder of TISA Leiden & Lisbon | CEO Teddy Kids | Portfolio Real Estate in Netherlands, Mexico and Dubai
summary:
With a robust foundation in business and finance, I took the lead at our family's enterprise, Teddy Kids, in 2010. Under my leadership from 2018, Teddy Kids didn't just become a prominent daycare in Leiden; it evolved into a symbol of quality. With our flagship centers on Rijnsburgerweg and the iconic Lorenzkade, combined with our distinctive pink and blue Tesla fleet and our endearing alpacas, we've cemented our brand. Our bilingual curriculum, anchored in excellence, has made Teddy Kids the go-to institution in the region.

2019 was a pivot year. Driven by my innate passion for construction, I diversified our portfolio. Today, we've stamped our mark in prime locales such as Leiden, Den Haag, Tulum, and Dubai.

The journey continued in 2022 with the launch of TISA – a state-of-the-art international business/STEM school in Leiden, dedicated to nurturing the next generation, starting from age 3. Our first year was nothing short of phenomenal. From our students' inaugural company projects to their captivating performance in the Nutcracker Christmas show, we've set a high bar.

Today, we are in August 2023: as TISA Leiden celebrates its maiden anniversary, we also spread our wings with the introduction of TISA Lisbon. Our global TISA community now enriches the lives of 90 eager learners. In the same breath, Teddy Kids marks its 19th year – a testimony to our relentless pursuit of excellence.

Discover more about our ventures:

Teddy Kids: www.teddykids.nl | Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/teddykids.nl/
TISA: www.tisaschool.nl | Instagram - http://instagram.com/tisaleiden/

profile_positions.description:
TISA is not just a school; it's a transformative learning space where contemporary teaching methods meet time-honored values, ensuring the blossoming of every student's innate potential. Here's what sets us apart:

Balanced Pedagogy: By fusing the best of modern teaching practices with traditional values, we aim to sculpt our students into socially responsible leaders and changemakers for the global arena.

Entrepreneurial Mindset: At the heart of our curriculum lies the cultivation of entrepreneurial thinking. We understand the importance of 21st-century skills, preparing our students not just for the challenges of today but those of tomorrow.

Accelerated Growth: Since our inception in 2022, TISA has celebrated remarkable milestones. From student-led company projects to grand cultural spectacles like the Nutcracker Christmas show, our journey has been nothing short of phenomenal.

Global Perspective: Just a year into our venture, TISA has expanded its footprint with a new branch in Lisbon, catering to a vibrant community of 45 passionate learners.

Holistic Development: While academic excellence remains our forte, we recognize the importance of arts in nurturing well-rounded individuals. Hence, we offer diverse workshops, ranging from dance and ballet to music and art, as well as in depth learning of programming and coding, robotics and science.

At TISA, we're committed to fostering an environment where every learner can dream big, challenge the status quo, and become a beacon of change in the global community.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
At Teddy Kids, we set the benchmark for exceptional childcare and education in Leiden and its surrounding regions. Our unique offerings include:

Bilingual Curriculum: Designed to cater to both the expatriate and local communities, our bilingual approach ensures a comprehensive educational experience for every child.

Distinctive Amenities: We don't just follow the norm; we redefine it. Our centers are home to playful alpacas and pygmy goats, offering children a touch of nature.

Eco-friendly Transport: Our fleet of iconic pink and blue Teslas ensures children are transported safely to school and various events, all while prioritizing environmental consciousness.

Celebrating Diversity: Our International Day stands out as a grand culinary celebration, honoring the diverse cultures of our community - a treat for both our young learners and their families.

Innovation at its Best: Not only were we the pioneers in accepting Bitcoin as a payment mode back in 2013, but we also made a grand statement by featuring an elephant during the inauguration of one of our centers.

Commitment to Excellence: At the heart of our operations is a relentless drive for quality. We pride ourselves on our experienced staff, world-class facilities, and a diverse program that deeply immerses children in various art forms.

State-of-the-Art Gym Facility: Our exclusive Teddy Gym, equipped with top-tier apparatus from Janssen Fritsen, offers a holistic physical education experience. Furthermore, our specialized workshops in dance, ballet, music, and art nurture well-rounded development.

At Teddy Kids, we're not just about the present; we're constantly exploring innovative ways to enrich the learning journey for every child.
profile_positions.title: Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
Together with my family, I run the 6 locations of Teddy Kids.

My main responsibilities include running the daily operations, developing new growth opportunities, increasing efficiency of operations (IT), and contact with all clients.

Our number one goal is to provide the best experience to the children and parents of our daycare and ensure a top quality service.

Currently taking care of 400 kids per day and have over 80 staff!
profile_positions.title: General Manager

profile_positions.description:
eKids was the first co-planning system designed specifically for daycare providers. This platform enabled managers, teachers, and even parents to customise and modify various schedules on demand. eKids provided care providers with enhanced flexibility, trust, and transparency in their day-to-day planning. The system was designed to be straightforward and user-friendly, automating tasks such as rosters, invoicing, tracking illnesses, and even payments. This automation meant branches could reduce paperwork and bookkeeping, leading to better quality care at reduced costs.

eKids had aimed to be the one-stop-shop for busy parents and managers.

This was a passion project close to my heart. For several years, I poured my energy and resources into it, even establishing an office in India with a dedicated team of 15 developers. However, despite the dedication and commitment, the project came to a close and entered an indefinite pause. There's a possibility that one day we might revive and take it further, but for now, it remains a cherished experience.

This journey equipped me with invaluable skills. Thanks to it, I learned to code, understand programming languages, and acquired significant expertise in Python.
profile_positions.title: Founder
